thread.title: Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu
thread.title_full: Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu

title: Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu
text:
Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu | Six terrorists killed after clash between security forces and terrorists in Orakzai 
BANNU: At least four terrorists were killed in a clash between security forces and terrorists in the wee hours of Friday near Bannu Baka Khel. 
According to sources, the operation was implemented after receiving a tip about the location of the secret refuge of terrorists. 
Four terrorists were killed during the operation and heavy ammunition was recovered, according to security sources. 
In a similar incident earlier tonight, terrorists attempted to target two check posts of the security forces in Orakzai Agency. In retaliatory fire against terrorists targeting the check posts, six terrorists were killed by the security forces. 0 0 Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu   Pakistan, Pakistan News, Latest News Pakistan, Geo News, Geo Tv, Bannu.   "Four terrorists killed by security forces during firing incident in Bannu" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/131395-Four-terrorists-killed-by-security-forces-during-firing-incident-in-Bannu+geo%2FGiKR+%28Geo+Pakistan+-
